dcterms:creator: Nazgul Toiganbayeva
Mahmoud Kasem
Galymzhan Abdimanap
Kairat Bostanbekov
Abdelrahman Abdallah
Anel Alimova
Daniyar Nurseitov
dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset of Kazakh handwritten texts consisting of 3000 handwritten exam papers and more than 140335 segmented images, containing approximately 922010 symbols. It serves researchers in handwriting recognition tasks using deep and machine learning methods.
dcterms:title: Kazakh Offline Handwritten Text Dataset (KOHTD)

dcterms:creator: U.-V. Marti
H. Bunke
dcterms:description: A handwritten sentence database for offline handwriting recognition, made on the Lancaster-Oslo/Bergen (LOB) Corpus, containing 1,539 scanned handwritten pages with labeled sentences and text lines.
dcterms:title: IAM dataset

dcterms:creator: E. Augustin
M. Carré
E. Grosicki
J.-M. Brodin
E. Geoffrois
F. Prêteux
dcterms:description: A database of handwritten samples similar to those sent by postal mail and fax, filled by 1300 volunteers, containing 5605 mails and 12,723 pages.
dcterms:title: RAMIS

dcterms:creator: D. Nurseitov
K. Bostanbekov
D. Kurmankhojayev
A. Alimova
A. Abdallah
R. Tolegenov
dcterms:description: A database of handwritten Kazakh and Russian texts, consisting of more than 1,500 forms and about 63,000 sentences, written by approximately 200 different writers.
dcterms:title: HKR (Handwritten Kazakh and Russian) database

dcterms:creator: M. Pechwitz
S. S. Maddouri
V. Märgner
N. Ellouze
H. Amiri
dcterms:description: A database of handwritten Arabic town/village names, filled by 411 writers with nearly 26,400 names containing more than 210,000 characters.
dcterms:title: IFN/ENIT

dcterms:creator: S. A. Mahmoud
I. Ahmad
W. G. Al-Khatib
M. Alshayeb
M. T. Parvez
V. Märgner
G. A. Fink
dcterms:description: An open Arabic offline handwritten text database consisting of 1000 handwritten forms written by 1000 different writers, containing 2000 randomly selected paragraphs.
dcterms:title: KHATT

dcterms:creator: T. Su
T. Zhang
D. Guan
dcterms:description: A corpus-based database for offline recognition of general-purpose Chinese handwritten text, containing 853 forms and 186,444 characters.
dcterms:title: HIT-MW
